p: Similar to Evaporation, the CLDTOT parameter (Fig. 5e(i–iii), it is found that 2 o model configurations perform much better than 1 o model configurations in all domains. In the Monsoon domain, coarse model configurations have the best NRMSE values and comparable PCC values. The 2 o model configuration (c0_ocn = 0.005) performs best for CLDTOT. After model tuning, CLDTOT shows an improvement in the range 7–16% for 2 o resolution and 3–10% in 1 o resolution.
